title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.67 - Consistency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.67 - Consistency

State Regulations

Continued uniformity, during a period or from one period
to another, in methods of accounting, mainly in valuation bases and methods of
accrual, as reflected in the financial statements of an accounting
entity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.67

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
